info.name: Clean Up Forbes.com (0.10)
info.description: You know how Forbes has a 100-pixel wide block of text surrounded by 400 pixels of sidebars, ads, and offers? Not any more! Note: This gets rid of the search box. If you find a way to put it in nicely, notify me (pavpanchekha@gmail.com)

data.title: Excellent script for Forbes readers. It goes beyon
